structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741p-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cities may appropriate money and accept grants for park purposes.
